about_the_game:
Vessel is a multi-perspective puzzle game where you harness the power of object swapping to carve your path forward. Immerse yourself in the exploration of a forgotten underwater civilization, unveiling its mysteries as you navigate its intricate and atmospheric world.

View by View, to See

In Vessel, every perspective reveals a new layer of the puzzle. Switch viewpoints to uncover hidden paths, connect seemingly unrelated elements, and piece together the story of a forgotten underwater civilization. By exploring the world from multiple angles, you’ll unlock secrets and solve challenges that test your perception and creativity.

Step by Step, to Ascend

Each step forward requires you to switch viewpoints, analyze the environment, and strategically swap objects. Use this unique ability to craft pathways and overcome obstacles, steadily climbing toward the surface of a forgotten underwater world. Every move is a deliberate choice, every swap a step closer to ascension.

Piece by Piece, to Perfection

Unravel the mysteries of the past by collecting scattered clues and piecing together the history of a forgotten civilization. Every discovery strengthens your abilities, preparing you for the challenges ahead. Gather knowledge, refine your skills, and face formidable bosses as you ascend toward mastery. Only by perfecting yourself, step by step, can you uncover the truth and achieve ultimate triumph.

  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 460 / Intel® Arc™ A380 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 5700XT 8GB / NVIDIA® GeForce RTX 2060 6GB
